--- title: Multi PySpin Camera Utilities keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "simple 'singleton' API for multiple cameras with PySpin library" ---

setup[source]

setup(yaml_path)

This will setup (initialize + configure) a camera given a yaml configuration file

init[source]

init(serial)

Initializes camera

deinit[source]

deinit(serial)

De-initializes camera

get_gain[source]

get_gain(serial)

Gets gain from camera

set_gain[source]

set_gain(serial, gain)

Sets gain for camera

get_exposure[source]

get_exposure(serial)

Gets exposure from camera

set_exposure[source]

set_exposure(serial, exposure)

Sets exposure for camera

get_frame_rate[source]

get_frame_rate(serial)

Gets frame rate from camera

set_frame_rate[source]

set_frame_rate(serial, frame_rate)

Sets frame rate for camera

start_acquisition[source]

start_acquisition(serial)

Starts acquisition of camera

end_acquisition[source]

end_acquisition(serial)

Ends acquisition of camera

get_image[source]

get_image(serial, *args)

Gets image from camera

node_cmd[source]

node_cmd(serial, cam_node_str, cam_method_str, pyspin_mode_str=None, cam_node_arg=None)

Performs method on input cam node with optional access mode check

update_timestamp_offset[source]

update_timestamp_offset(serial)

Updates timestamp offset

reset_cameras[source]

reset_cameras()

register[source]

register()

Run constructor and register destructor. Should be called once when first imported
